author: KarolKaczmarek
body:
![colors](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6466574/13937617/779a65ba-ef83-11e5-9f40-db52f4761499.png)

It's regular white font before calling Start-PSBuild and yellow afterwards

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
It's probably a `dotnet` cli problem.
You can do `cmd /c color 07` to fix colors (it would default to black screen on the background, but still better).

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Our function doesn't set this color. Follow up with CLI if that's the cause.

title: Start-PSBuild changes default font color in the PowerShell window
